app.name: Momei Blog
app.description: Momei Blog - An AI-driven, natively internationalized developer blog platform. AI-powered, Global Creation.

demo.banner_text: Demo Mode is active. You can explore all features, but data will be reset periodically.

tour.welcome_desc: Momei is an AI-driven, natively internationalized blog platform. We'll show you how to use AI to boost productivity and reach a global audience.
tour.login_desc: In Demo mode, we auto-fill the demo account. Just click Login to enter the admin panel.
tour.editor_desc: This is our powerful Markdown editor. The 'stars' menu on the right holds AI tools.
tour.ai_desc: Click here! AI can suggest titles, generate summaries, extract tags, or translate the entire post.
tour.publish_desc: Once done, set your Slug and publish. Remember, data here is ephemeral.
tour.nav_desc: Easily access the post list, categories, tags, and archives through the navigation bar.
tour.admin_desc: Admins can access the dashboard here to manage content, users, and system settings.
tour.search_desc: Powerful and fast search functionality, accessible anytime with Ctrl + K.
tour.theme_desc: Toggle between Light or Dark theme for the most comfortable reading experience.
tour.lang_desc: Momei supports multiple languages. You can switch the UI and content language here.
tour.user_desc: Manage your profile, security settings, or sign in to your account.

meta.title: About Momei - AI-driven, Natively Internationalized Developer Blog Platform
meta.description: Learn how Momei leverages AI to empower full-stack internationalization for developers.

hero.title: Momei
hero.subtitle: AI-powered, Global Creation. An intelligent blog system tailored for developers.

meaning.title: Origin and Meaning
meaning.text_1: The name "Momei" (Ink Plum) is inspired by the poem "Ink Plum" by Wang Mian of the Yuan Dynasty:
meaning.poem:
"My home is by the tree near the ink-washing pool,
Every flower blooms with faint traces of ink.
I don't need people to praise its good color,
Only leaving a clear fragrance filling the universe."
meaning.text_2: Taking "Mo" (Ink) symbolizes writing and cultivation, echoing the essence of blog content; taking "Mei" (Plum) implies the tenacious creative spirit and unique personal style.
meaning.intro: Momei platform is dedicated to providing creators with:
features: Seamless blog migration tools and SEO preservation
Global reach by bridging language gaps with AI

items.title: AI Assistant
items.desc: Deeply integrated AI for automated translation, smart title suggestions, and summary generation to boost productivity.

items.title: Path Management
items.desc: Fully customizable URL Slugs, ensuring zero SEO loss when migrating from other platforms.

items.title: Native I18n
items.desc: Goes beyond UI translation with cluster-based content management and smart language routing.

push_options.none_desc: Publish the post only, no notification to subscribers.
push_options.draft_desc: Automatically create a marketing campaign draft for later editing and sending.
push_options.now_desc: Immediately send an email notification to relevant subscribers after publication.

posts.translation_group_hint: Link different language versions of the same post to enable switcher on front end

commercial.global_toggle_desc: Enable or disable global monetization/sponsorship. When enabled, sponsor buttons will be displayed based on author or site-wide settings.
commercial.global_social_desc: Configure global default social links (used when author hasn't set their own).
commercial.global_donation_desc: Configure global default donation links (used when author hasn't set their own).

notifications.title: Admin Notification Preferences
notifications.description: Configure how admins receive alerts for specific site events. Timely notifications help you respond quickly to user interactions and system issues.

hints.ai_enabled: Enable AI translation, summary and other features

hints.keywords_placeholder: One keyword per line. Matching comments will be marked as pending or spam.
hints.memos_access_token: Generate in Memos Settings -> Account -> Access Tokens
